LoomHosts, a Singaporean-based VPS and Web Hosting solutions hosting business has today launched an OpenVZ SSD Offering which will be competitively priced among the market to allow prospective buyers more choices in virtual servers with SSDs in different locations.

This is in line with LoomHosts' mission to provide services which are reliable, solid and yet affordable at the same time. With it having recently celebrated its 2-year anniversary with the promotions still ongoing, this new offering allows for much needed expansion and advancements in its offerings.

LoomHosts' VPS already includes the following features at the moment:

-24/7 Ticket Support

-99.9% Guarantee on Uptime with SLA coverage

-FREE SSL Certificates via OneClickSSL

-7 Day Money Back Guarantee

-Reliable Dallas Upstream via Limestone Networks, Inc. datacenter and network (AS46475) with transit via TeliaSonera, AboveNet, Savvis, Cogent, Internap

-FREE DNS [name hosting] Servers Upon Request

-FREE Incoming Bandwidth - Incoming Bandwidth is not Accounted!

-Reverse-DNS Setup in our Client Panel - No Need for Ticketing!

-IPv6-support!

-FREE SSL Certificates for services supported by GlobalSign OneClickSSL!

-Discounted Licensing on cPanel and WHMCS.
